name: Megan
review: This foundation is sooo good, I love how it has a huge color range and finishes for different skin types. Also it looks amazing on the skin and last from am to pm. My holy grail product!

name: Sarah
review: Great full coverage make up! Goes on smooth and blends well!

name: Doc Mom
review: Full coverage daily use

name: Alli
review:
Best drugstore foundation out there. Ive found if you put on a mattifying lotion before applying, it lasts even longer.
Only thing that could be better is the color selection.

name: Cee
review: Great for darker skin! Also great for oily skin!

name: J M
review: This foundation is surprisingly amazing. I was hesitant, mostly because it is hard to buy the right color and a lot of foundations feel heavy and icky. This stuff is great. Coverage is buildable, color is true and stays (no turning orange!), and it feels nice on my skin. I live in south Texas, this stuff doesn't run or leave me feeling greasy. If you're on the fence, I highly recommend trying it out for yourself. :)

name: B
review: I just recently switched foundations and was a little nervous. I love this product and would definetly buy it again, and it's affordable.

name: JanetD
review: If you are sensitive smell, do not waste your time on this. The smell was so strong and chemically I had to wash it off immediately.

name: Bri
review: I applied this product with a beauty blender and it looked horrible on my skin.

name: sassy
review: I love it.

name: TG
review: Stays on for a long time.

name: a lame person
review: I have been looking for a long lasting drugstore foundation for a while. This product is long lasting, easy to apply and blend, and more. The only problem is that it's sticky to the touch even after applying powder.

name: LuluNJ
review: I'm in my early 30s and have sensitive combo/oily skin, and prone to breakouts. I've tried some high end products to drugstore brands because I don't have the luxury to buy high end products all the time. And this is the best all day oil controling, matte foundation I've used by far even compared to some of the high end brands I've tried. I spray some deslick setting spray on my damp sponge and apply, and it looks great all day. (I only do medium coverage for a more natural look).

name: Myra
review: I like it but my face gets very shiny and oily. Especially on my nose

name: Kathy
review: Color was too dark, also colors seems to turn orange. Did not like this product at all!!!will be returning to Ulta.

name: HM89
review: I'm actually very pleased with this. I've been trying alot of expensive foundations lately trying to find the right one and i've had no luck. So I decided to just buy a cheap one and found it to be much better. All the expensive brands were melting off my face and making me look greasy. This did not do that, nor did I break out. I got ivory and it's pretty light. Definitely has a pink under tone. It's also more of a light coverage. I've always been a fan of revlon I shouldve known it would be nice.

name: Mands
review: I have oily/combination skin which used to mean I had to carry blotting paper with me as I had to blot about 2-3 times on a regular day to get rid of the shine on the forehead. I noticed a difference with this foundation straight away. It goes on easily and blends beautifully whether you prefer just some light coverage or build up for medium or full coverage. The finish is matte to start off with and for someone with oily/combination skin like me it usually starts looking dewy after about 3-4 hours. The foundation holds for a good 8-9 hours - usually I am pleasantly surprised at how "fresh" the foundation still looks when I am about to take my make up off after work.

name: Cool Grandma
review: Great colt selection, blends well, never clumpy

name: Honeybzzy
review: One pump to back of hand. Use foundation brush or blender from center of face outwards. Natural satin finish. For matte use setting powder. DOES NOT OXIDIZE DARKER :) I'm super oily. #400 Caramel

name: Angel
review: Favor

name: Fouqia Atif
review: I belong to a hot country...so I needed some longwear budget friendly foundation and no doubt stay free is the one that fit my criteria ....loved it

name: Kimberly
review: I have used MAC and MakeUp Forever but I always switch back to this one! It is full coverage, doesn't slide around on my oily spots and doesn't dry out the other areas. I love it and it has SPF! Excellent product!

name: Jane Osana
review: I used the produc to even put my complexion and also control my oil. I also didn't need to use power as much or even at all since it's matte finished

name: KT
review: I like this product. It worked very well on me. Very pleased

name: Queen Acb
review: I actually bought this product not knowing it was meant for oily/combination skin. i have dry skin and the product works well with it! doesn't cling to dry patches or feel dry on my face. i know other people with dry skin like this product too because i actually found it looking on youtube specifically for foundations for dry skin.

name: Violet
review: The foundation is one of my favorites. It lasts all day, goes on nicely, and makes my skin look amazing but sadly it causes my skin to break out. My acne usually reacts well to salicylic acid but for some reason this foundation makes me break out any ways

name: Aerie
review: Poor color selection

name: Break out
review: It was a very nice foundation and controlled my oily skin. Though after a week or so it made me break out.

name: Lulu M
review: I love this foundation it's very affordable and it reminds me a lot of the Estée Lauder double wear foundation just not as heavy. I am in the shade buff that shade is a little litter than my neck but once I put my powder and contour it looks like the perfect shade. My skin is oily and some dry spots on some of the acne areas of my face. It clings on to dry patches that's fur sure so I wouldn't recommend this to people with dry skin. I say that it's a must to apply prime or else your oils will break down the makeup this happens around my nose but even though it breaks down it doesn't look horrible and that's why I love this foundation and it has a pump!!!

name: Moni
review: I've never used this foundation before and was a bit hesitant to buy them but I'm completely satisfied with how smoothly it goes on, how light it feels, and how long it stays on. I really like the pump bottle. I also appreciate getting them on sale. :-)

name: Jay
review: I really don't like this product it's awful

name: Val99
review: I've using this foundation for years now and I'm 17 now and still love it even after they updated it. I always get compliments on how great my skin looks and how airbrushed I look. I have some acne and redness with quite a few of pores and this foundation covers it.  I love that now it has a pump! This foundation does the same or even better than a higher end foundation. You must try it!

name: Emoliv
review: Y'all..seriously this product is awesome. I have SUPER oily skin and this foundation keeps it under control better than any other does. I LOVE IT!!

name: Amanda
review: I've been using this for years. It did its job and for the money you can't beat it. It will become cakey though. I recently switched to Estée Lauder and I love it!

name: Jazz Lyons
review: I've been using this product for years and people comment that I look flawless every time I were it!

name: krista7515
review: this foundation is not worth it. it's way too cakey and overall not worth buying again.

name: MDH
review: I love this foundation. I've tried expensive name brand makeup and this tops them all. I don't have to touch up my makeup all day and it still looks fresh at the end of the work day. Frequently I'll touch up a little powder and mascara and then I'm set for the night. I blend my regular and summer color for the spring and fall when I'm starting to get or lose a tan, so that I have the right color match all year.

name: Kay
review: My skin felt oily and it came off extremely quickly

name: Niecy
review: I use almost everyday. I have used for years and will continue using. I like how it covers and it is lightweight.

name: Sally Ann
review: This foundation is streaky if applied with a brush that isn't super dense, but goes super well with a sponge. It dries quickly, so you have to work fast before it dries. It is very long lasting and builadble, but the oily version does stick to dry patches. I have extreme combo/oily skin, which means that I have dry patches but get extremely oily in my t zone.

name: Abigail
review: I have super oily skin and this is the only foundation that doesn't break down in my t-zone. There isn't a shade that is light enough for me so I have to mix it, but that is the only con. I've been using this for years on and off and I keep coming back to it!

name: aaw0422
review: I love wearing this foundation. Its light weight and great for everyday use. I have dark spots that i am able to conceal with not having to pack on alot of foundation. One of the best inexpensive foundations to use. I have combination skin and it works very well. I have recommended this foundation and it was a success for that person as well.

name: E Jones
review: I have extremely fair, sensitive, combo oily skin with very red and pink undertones. This foundation covers my redness and leaves my skin looking flawless ALL DAY! I have been looking for a foundation that would work well with my oily t zone and this is the one.  Love it Love it Love it! I had originally purchased Too Faced Born This Way because of the amazing reviews and don't get me wrong, it's great, but it causes severe break outs on my chin and it doesn't stay nearly as well as this one.

name: Josie
review: I have tried different drugstore foundations for around four years and this one best suits my skin. I have combo skin that used to be much drier. This foundation is definitely full coverage and would not recommend to those who are looking for a natural look. I use this on most days of the week. It does get oily after time but that is why you use loose/setting/pressed powder. Without powder it is "dewy," which does not look bad but does move more, say, if you touch your face. I apply this foundation with a beauty blender, which I think is best. I love this foundation and think it is the best among most drugstore foundations you can find, at least for my preferences and skin type.

name: VoldeMorticia
review: I'm liking this foundation better than other high end foundations I have tried. It lasts about 11 hours on my greasy skin. My powder products blend out totally fine on top of it. It does tend to look a bit heavy up close but maybe it's because I set my face with powder.

name: Mrs. KB
review: I wear this every day and it is awesome!

name: KML
review: The only thing that compares to me is the PUR line. I've tried several over the years. And while I love PUR as well, I just prefer the revlon pump for application.

name: Dennice
review: Perfect color for my olive skin tone

name: Arwyn
review:
I have tried long and hard to find a foundation that works for me at the drugstore, which is hard because I don't like spending $10 or more on ANY makeup product. Maybelline, elf, CoverGirl, their foundations all failed me. This is the only one I've found that will stay on the entire day.

I work up to six hour shifts combined with going to school, and this foundation stays put through all of that. It doesn't ever get greasy, only a bit dewy, and that's after sweating away in a food service job.

You can build up the coverage to however much you want, it blends easily (best to apply with a beauty blender), and you don't even feel it on your face. This is foundation I will take with me to the grave.

name: Makeup Queen
review: Love this foundation! It's amazing and I don't know why I didn't try it sooner. I picked it up because a co-worker told me it was really good and she used it on her clients when she did makeup. I got it because I was having a hard time finding the right shade in higher end foundations and one that was best for my skin. Gave it a shot and this is my third bottle I'm on. It gives my skin a nice healthy glow, my makeup lasts from the time I put it on until I take it off without touching up, it's a medium to high medium coverage, it gives you a nice satin Matte finish, easy to apply and blends in great, controls my oil amazing and outbeats my high end foundations, it actually matches my skin! I'm a pale princess and it's so hard to actually find a foundation that matches my skin but to find one that's drugstore is huge! The colors are always way too dark, or super yellow toned. I find myself reaching for this over my higher end foundations. Love that this has a pump as well. I was super impressed when it held up in 90 degree heat that we had 3 days ago.

name: Elena
review: I was expecting too much from this foundation, what happened to me is that it only lasted for 3 or 4 hours which is so little, and the worst part is that it started to break on my skin which made it look too ugly. That is a no no for me.

name: Hannah
review: This foundation is one of the best I have tried. It goes on easily (love the pump) and has good coverage for how lightweight it feels. It makes my skin feel like it doesn't have foundation on, and won't melt off onto my fingers when I touch my face. I have an oily forehead and nose with dry patches on my chin and under my eyebrows. With previous foundations, the product with cake up on the dry areas and become slick and shiny throughout the day. The Revlon foundation has impressed me by having little to no cakeyness on dry areas and preventing my face from becoming greasy and slick. A great quality foundation overall.

name: Vanessa
review: I have bought at least 15 expensive foundations, then one day mine exploded and my friend handed hers to me. I WAS HOOKED

name: Gabi
review: Very lightweight, great pigment, a very buildable foundation

name: Rho
review:
I went searching for a liquid foundation that would give me great coverage and not make my face oily
Let me add, I have EXTREMELY oily skin on my face. This is the FIRST foundation I've found that does that at a great price! Definitely worth the $11 or $12 I spent! It stays on all day without making my face oily. It also blends really well!

name: Erin
review: This is the best drugstore foundation I have found after trying many and it's the only one I've even considered repurchasing. The coverage is great, it stays on pretty well, doesn't get patchy, and has pretty good oil control. The only complaint I have is that I have to mix colors to get the color right but that's not too bothersome considering how well it works. The only reason I'm taking off a star is because occasionally this foundation does get cakey around my nose...it's probably just my skin though not the foundation's fault. Overall, I would recommend this to a friend as a good long lasting foundation. It's great for special occasions too!

name: scrapperluv
review:
I was using MAC's full-coverage foundation and was on the hunt for something more affordable but just as good. I Googled it and found this as a recommendation. Perfect! A fraction of the cost, has full coverage and doesn't slide off my oily skin. I have large pores and sensitive/acne prone skin, so I need good coverage and this make me look flawless.
Little word of warning. I think this might cause a little bit of breakouts. Not horrible and no more than the comparable MAC product, and the coverage is worth it for me. I dust over it with Maybelline Matte-poreless powder for normal-oily skin. Really, the combo is flawless.

name: Jaglet7t
review: The old formula was way better. This new formula is awful! Doesn't work and breaks me out, in addition to making me oily!!! Reckon made a huge mistake changing their formula!!!

name: Maymay
review: I use this foundation religiously for everyday use. The price is awesome for the amount of coverage it gives. I can build coverage as well for night time use. It has never made me break out, and doesn't transfer really. Overall I think anyone with acne/sensitive skin should try this out. Good for beginners too who are looking to practice medium to full coverage application without paying huge prices for foundation.

name: AKB179
review: This is the absolute best foundation. I wanted an everyday go-to foundation, and this is it! Stays on great and easy to apply. Love how it has a pump too- it makes it so much easier to use. Does a great job at keeping the shine away as well. This foundation is way better than infallible, true match, and ready set gorgeous.

name: Jaz
review: Love it?

name: Porcelain Pale
review: I always have a hard time finding foundations, as I am quite pale. Most brands, when you get to the lighter end of the color scale, get very yellow based. I use Ivory and it matches perfectly. I love that this foundation can be applied in a thin layer, but also a little thicker to get a heavier coverage. It never feels heavy or cakey to me, just light and comfortable. It doesn't dry out my skin either, which is a huge bonus. By far, my favorite foundation (and I have tried out quite a few to find one that worked). I'd definitely recommend this!

name: Zona
review: This foundation definitely has staying power.  It doesn't rub off easily which is what I wanted.  It did rub a little bit on my collar, but not too much. The color I chose is a great match to my skin, and the coverage is very good. It did not make my skin oily, and it goes on a little satiny, but is easily matted out with setting powder. It blends well.  This is a good foundation for people on a budget that want staying power, good coverage on a budget.

name: Jackie
review: I have always bought expensive foundations this is one of the cheapest I bought and it's my favorite! It stays on all day and is great coverage.

name: Momma Michele
review: Matte all day 10+ hours. I did use primer and set with powder and finishing spray, but probably not necessary. Blends out nice and easily with beauty sponge. Didn't try it with a brush because I prefer foundation application with a slightly damp sponge.  I used a cream contour on top and powder blush, bronzer and highlighter, they all applied beautifully.  This covered my rosatia and skin blemishes without any color correction.  This is my first time purchasing and I'm super pleased.

name: ne-ne
review: I bought this a few years ago after trying every drugstore brand that they sell and this is the best. It stays on for a solid 8+ hours and I have extremely oily skin so that's amazing. It doesn't feel heavy and doesn't come off until you want it to. I have never experienced an increase in breakouts after using it just perfect looking skin. I was very excited to see it in a pump now because the only downside of the product was having to pour it out which wasted a lot of product. I have recommended it to everyone I know

name: Lilah
review: I mix this foundation with a drop of my concealer to get the perfect consistency & coverage I need. The foundation is great by itself, but like with most brands, I don't have an exact match in color just because I have a very unique skin tone. I am usually a brand buyer and will drop $30-$50 on a foundation without hesitation, but I tried this out for my daily makeup routine and it's phenomenal-dare I say, better than the pricier brands!

name: DS1030
review: This foundation is perfect for me (combo/sensitive skin)! The coverage is light to med but it is buildable. I just go back in on areas I need more coverage. I apply with a beauty sponge after primer. Lasts all day with a setting power! I would not recommend without a powder over the top because it sets slightly sticky. My face looks perfect all day, no breaking up or transfer!

name: Fifi
review:
I just recently discovered this foundation and it is amazing for my oily t-zone. I apply my foundation at 7am five days a week for my office job and with other foundations by 10am I am oily and need to blot. Also by 10am the oil that has built up on my face around my nose has pushed my foundation aside and that area is without foundation for the rest of the day. I don't know what's in this stuff, but it stays on all day and my oily skin doesn't break it down - I am smooth and matte all day, even in my very oily t-zone area. So glad I heeded the words of Wayne Goss and gave this a try!

Also I have rosacea so I need medium to full coverage. I apply the first layer all over my face and then I build a second light layer across my nose and cheeks only to completely conceal my rosacea all day. Fantastic!

name: ANC01
review: Repurchase this time and time again.  The shade range is so good, almost so that I never know which foundation is my best match,  I have oily/acne prone skin and always need matte foundations to wear.  This isn't 100% mattifying and after a 10 hour day it definitely isn't full coverage and matte anymore but it still gets the job done for everyday wear.  Doesn't cause breakouts and the fact that it has a pump makes it 10x greater

name: Molly
review: I love , love, love this foundation!  I was using Mary Kay cream to powder but it started making my skin look  muddy. I haven't used a liquid foundation  in years but after not finding another compact type foundation that worked for me , I tried this. I'm 63 and it makes me look 20 years younger!  After a long day it still looks great.  Gotta say it again . LOVE IT.

name: MaggiePen
review: I know this might sound crazy, but I have used most high end brands and I always, always go back to this foundation.  I don't have a problem with acne, but need full coverage for acne scars and this foundation is perfect for me.  I have tried GA Luminous Silk. KVD Lock It, Makeup Forever Ultra HD, full coverage foundation from ulta's competitor, and MAC Studio Fix and every time I wind up coming back to this as my go-to foundation.  This goes on very smoothly with a damp beauty blender and then it needs to be set with a powder or it will transfer.  I set it with Ben Nye banana powder. Most days I don't even need concealer!  I would definitely recommend this!!

name: CKehoe
review: This foundation isn't perfect, but the price point is amazing! It provides full coverage and lasts several hours before breaking down. It's not super buildable, though, and I've found that if I go back in after it dries and try to apply more over a trouble spot, the foundation will come off.

name: Kayleigh
review:
I have been using this foundation for years. I always try to switch to an expensive one like urban decay or something similar and end up returning it.
It is hard thought to find my exact color so I have about 5 that I use throughout the year.

name: MBarr
review: This foundation was nice at first but during the afternoon I noticed the foundation would transfer onto my fingers and was starting to break down. The foundation is good for a couple hour, cheap foundation but I don't recommend for a long day.

name: Lisa
review: I love the all day wear

name: Andrea
review: This has better coverage than the last foundation I was using. It isnt heavy but covers mostly everything. I stay matte allll day too. Seriously, i can put this on in the morning and be confident that it's gonna look good until i take it off. My tip is don't use too much setting powder or it will look too dry. And of course use moisturizer beforehand.

name: LopezV97
review: I have slightly dry, but very oily skin. This foundation helps control the shine you get throughout the day, and though it doesn't block it all, it does make it bearable. Will have to buy this again!

name: Odessa
review:
Chose two different color/pigment and use both at the same time
Careful with packaging-- people can sample the product, but it still appears to be sealed/untampered

name: KountryKaitin
review: First off, this product really is long lasting. I like that you can chose between skin types normal/dry and combo/oily. I'm the latter. And once I put this on in the morning I don't usually do any touch ups the rest of the day, unless I have a special occasion. Second, I realized the trick with this stuff is a little goes a long way, if you use too much it just ends up smearing everywhere. With that said, use as little as possible and spot apply for special areas that need a little more attention. It really does a great job at covering breakouts and has a nice color range. Overall, definitely one of my favorite foundations for sure!

name: That One Chick
review: This foundation is amazing for oily skin! it wears for a very long time without getting super shiny and it looks beautiful on the skin. Great coverage without looking heavy or cakey. I wear this foundation everyday. I'm super pale and the lightest shade matches me well enough! I may even buy the next shade down next time because I have a warm undertone.

name: Amby
review: I was using clinique, and if just didn't work for my combination skin by the end of the day my skin was nasty and oily. With reckon colorstay Combination my skin is not oily. Yes I would recommend to a friend.

name: Bsmum
review: Best foundation hands down. I have tried everything possible and always come back to this. I have been using it for over 10 years. Love it. I have combination skin mostly oily and acne scars this covers better than anything. I use a blending sponge to apply my face looks so smooth.

name: Lucia Aviles
review: I love this product because is easy to apply in the skin and have perfect coverage .

name: Naomi5280
review: I have tried several foundations from Clinique, Urban Decay, Laura Mercier, Tarte, etc, and I find the medium coverage on this to be more natural, staying power equal, and application smoother. Whenever I venture out to try another brand, I always end up coming back to this. I have combination skin, very dry in some places, very oily in others. It does not melt off or change color on my oily spots and it doesn't cake and flake on my dry spots. What more could you ask for?

name: Neesie
review: Just awesome!

name: Daniela
review: Everyday

name: Tra
review: This was my first time using this product and I loved it, it gives full coverage and matte finish doesn't make my skin oily. I love it

name: Renee
review: Love it so much

name: Fran
review: I like the pump for coverage.

name: naomi
review: I've tried literally hundreds of foundations over the years and this is the one I always come back to. Coverage can be medium/natural to more full depending on application. Doesn't turn orange after being on oily skin for a few hours. Length of wear is more like 9-10 hours before it requires a touch up, but that's long enough to make it through a work day! I prep with Urban Decay primer and set with a sheer HD powder. Give it a try, you won't regret it.

name: Angella
review: I spray rose water on my sponge and dab all over my face and neck.

name: Angella
review: I spray rose water on my sponge and apply the foundation to the sponge and dab all over my face and neck.

name: Bridget
review: Really great for the price

name: Kita
review: I was surprised on how long it lasted I went to a party and it lasted the whole time even after! And it matched my skin tone very well! I bearly felt it is not heavy at all!

name: Jordan
review: I'm normally a high end makeup buyer, but I've tried the high end foundations and this one is by far a favorite.

name: Xtina.x0
review: This is now my everyday foundation I was a MAC girl and would only use MAC foundation but I feel this has the same coverage and is half the price

name: Budget sandra
review: I was searching for a different foundation because i became tiree of the loreal pro matte i been using this foundation for 3 days its sooo awsome it doesnt transfer it really stays on i dont get shiny overall i only touched up one time it really holds but i use it in combo w my bodyshop tea tree oil control lotion  and my soap and glory heck of a blot primer this is the besy primer i have used its a great deal for the price and my face after this is poreless and flawless i do recommend im in love

name: kimg
review: I bought this one because my sister recommended it to me and I love it. Goes on smooth and provides good coverage.

name: Revlon lover
review: I have been uding Revlon Colorstay FOUNDATION for over 20 years its my one go to foundation for all day wear. It does not rub off and i even wear it to the beach and pool with it staying in place perfectly. I also love that i only need to use 2-3 pumps for a completely full coverage which for me is great because i have scarring from teenage acne and a redness to my skin from rosacia. However i absolutely love the fact that it comes with a pump now considering that most people now days use brushes to apply. I have yet to complete my first bottle and i am hoping it does not cause problems towards the end of the bottle like Revlons primer that also uses a pump.

name: AEW13
review: I can't believe I've never tried this before. My search for a perfect foundation is over!

name: AH80
review: The variety of shades is great, it's har to find the perfect shade because they didn't have enough testers at Ulta, I was fortunate enough to pick the right one for me, and it's not a bad option from a price point perspective!

name: 7han7nah
review: At first, I really liked this product, but now that I've used it a few more times, I've noticed it keeps my skin oily and looking flaky.

name: Jayde
review: I really tried to like this makeup but it caused major breakouts and felt so greasy on my skin. Do not buy if you have sensitive skin.

name: StarBright
review: Love

name: sosee11
review: I don't know why I ever stray from this foundation to try others, I always come back! Nothing beats this foundation in terms of coverage, color matching, and longevity.  It's a medium-full coverage foundation that looks like I have no makeup on at all! It stays put and does not settle into pores. You can even use it sparingly or mixed with moisturizer for more sheer coverage and it still blends very well. I have fair skin and Buff is a perfect shade for me in the winter - and it doesn't make me look like a ghost like many fair shades of other foundations do. Ironically, I have dry/very dry skin and I find that the combo/oily skin formulation works great for me, as long as I wear my usual layers of moisturizer and facial oil.  It dries to a velvet finish and keeps my skin looking fresh all day.

name: fotzlapen
review: This foundation has a pretty good color selection for being drug store and the shade fit my skin pretty well. I just really don't like this consistency on my face. I found that it didn't stay in place. I do like that it now has a pump when before it was a bottle you had to pour it from. I think it's a good foundation just not for my skin type.

name: Sarah
review: Not horrible in little doses - similar feel so sunscreen almost. Definitely for light coverage. If you use too much it'll be greasy and cakey.

name: Myra
review: I use this product everyday and I do not break out.

name: Ashley C
review: I typically buy expensive foundations, but I made this impulsive buy and was not disappointed. This foundation is absolutely amazing and so inexpensive! I totally recommend this if you have oily skin.

name: CandyTheArtist
review:
I truly hope that Revlon continues to keep this product in their line, I think I have about half of the colors in the line (based on what shade of pale or tan I am at any given point throughout the year). I bought it once on a whim and was absolutely amazed how long it lasted on my combination skin. I have an oily t-zone and it is hard for me to find a foundation that does not break up as the day goes by.

Used by itself and a setting powder, it stays all day. When I use it with Smashbox Photo Finish Primer, I can literally sleep with this make up on and wake up looking almost the same as when I went to bed.

I love that it is so versatile. I can apply it with a brush for full coverage (it is highly pigmented for a drugstore brand), or use a damp beauty blender/sponge for light to medium coverage. It also does not oxidize on my skin as some other foundations tend to. The only downfall is that it DOES contain Titanium Dioxide so it creates flashback with flash photography.

Revlon, you have a customer for life!

name: Ivettebm
review: This is my all time favorite drug store foundation. I have oily and acne prone skin. I love the coverage this foundation gives me and it stays on all day. I love that it's available for all skin types, in a large range of shades and has a pump. I noticed I've been using this foundation more than my Kat Von D Tatoo Lock it..

name: Deb
review: Use everyday

name: Leese
review: I love this foundation it last all day!!

name: shayydeniece
review: My skin is so oily and i have never found a product that holds up this good (not ever highend). After 8 hours there is no sliding and its not greasy. I don't have to touch up at all, and my makeup looks a lot as of I just applied it. Highly recommend for my super oily girls who haven't found that perfect foundation yet.

name: Sterra
review: I've used Revlon ColorStay foundation for years. It is my go to drugstore foundation. Since they've added a pump to the bottle it's made the foundation even better. It blends well, goes on smooth, and you can build it up for more of a full coverage without it looking cakey. When I wash it off my face there is never any residue.

name: Betzy E.
review: I really like that it works matte for oily skin. I bought the wrong color but still the product was good for the price.

name: Carrie
review: Was wanting more full coverage -- even with building it is light coverage at best

name: Cherise
review: I use it for full coverage

name: Cherise
review: I use it for full coverage

name: mpmakeup
review: I was super excited to try this because of all the great reviews. Unfortunately, it was way too runny and didn't blend well at all. The coverage was very patchy, and I ended up having to use my old foundation to blend it out.

name: Amber Zach
review:
first off, if you've ever used Kat Von D foundation then this is very very similar.

so overall this is a really great foundation! especially if you have oily skin. I actually have dry right now because of the winder. I get oily in the summer.

it is hard for me to blend using a brush. I highly recommend using a beauty blender or a real tech sponge. lightly buff it into your skin with the damp sponge.

it dries fairly quick and doesn't seem to be too matte that it flakes. 1 pump is light, 2 pumps is medium, and 3 is full. but use a damp sponge or you'll look like cake if you use a brush! and let it set before you "bake" your face.

it is long lasting. I've worn it for 12 hours and it seems to hold up pretty well for drug store make up. it's not flawless, but it's holding on really well!

I gave it 4 stars just because I had a really hard time blending it out with a brush. i used a lot more product with my brush than the sponge. I am not a fan of putting make up on with a sponge.

I've been using Maybelline fit me foundation matte finish and I like this foundation a lot better just because it isn't as drying and it last longer.

name: Janellen
review: After the bottle leaked while traveling, I poured the foundation into the previous bottle I had. I really don't like the applicator in the bottle. Other than these issues, I do like the foundation as its light and gives the coverage I want. Moderately priced.

name: lynn
review: Easy to apply  no shine  wears well

name: Betty Boop
review: This works great if you have mixed/greasy skin, stays matte almost all day. My only problem is that i cannot apply it with my blender sponge because it is super thick and it looks like you have patches so i have to apply it with my fingers for a more even application. Overall good product for the price

name: Tera
review: Have tried all the full coverage foundations and this one is amazing.  Lasts all day with great coverage.  I have extremely sensitive skin and the Combo/Oily Skin keeps my skin from ever having a breakout.  Always get compliments on how beautiful my skin is when I wear this.

name: Liz
review: It's hard for me to find a foundation that I like--I have combination dry/oily skin. This combo foundation is amazing! My skin looks flawless and it provides excellent coverage while looking natural as well. Definitely worth trying!

name: Kayla
review: I've been using this product since 2010 and still love it. It's one of the best long wearing foundations.

name: Dee
review: Love this me and my mom use this.

name: Iris
review: This product is great for oily skin. I live in a very hot and humid location and this hold up pretty well against my oily skin.

name: Mary
review: I love it and it's the perfect match to my skin

name: Jess
review: I love this product! I was looking for a full coverage foundation at a decent price that actually stays all day and this product does EXACTLY that. I use it with the matching finishing powder by Revlon as well!

name: Sam Sam
review: I've been using this foundation for years. I have acne scars and pink reddish tones in my face in fair/light skinned I use color (buff) and this foundation makes me just looks flawless and evenly colored. It gives such full coverage in just 1 coat. I just pump it onto my beauty blender and fully dab and blend into my skin then I use my concealer and use the Revlon color stay 24 hour powder and use a beauty blender to dab all over my face and neck to give it the matte look and I love it. I always have gotten compliments on how flawless I looked and without it I'm far from that. I tried a new foundation twice and didn't like it as much never got any compliments and recently tried it again and yeah I'm never trying any other foundation. I have tried many of the popular high end liquid foundations and they just oxidate on my face, this has never let me down always keeps my face make up lasting all day looking flawless.

name: madame makeup
review: Love the finish and quality of the formula. The only issue I have is that they all have pink undertone except for the lightest one, so I end up a little orange. I just mix the lightest one with my tone and it cancels out the orange so problem solved. Definitely worth the money, and in winter I just mix more of the light shade then in summer I use less of it so it is very versatile.

name: None
review: I do not like the smell, it's to oily broke my face out. Coverage is not good enough for me.

name: Savannah
review: I have tried every beauty product under the sun ranging from high quality professional/designer brands to bargain drugstore finds... And I have yet to discover any foundation that I love more than Revlon ColorStay! I've been using this product since high school, and ten years later it is still my absolute favorite full-coverage foundation and I wear it every day... Any time I've strayed from this product I've always come crawling back haha. I am complimented on my skin almost every time I wear this foundation and it provides amazing, opaque coverage without making your skin looked cracked or cakey, and won't settle into pores or fine lines throughout the day. It feels super lightweight and dries quickly so that your skin looks (and feels) really smooth and matte as soon as you apply powder... Even during my worst breakouts this makes my skin look even and glowing! Seriously, this foundation will make you look like a porcelain doll... Everyone is always shocked when I tell them that I use Revlon foundation because it wears so well and is so inexpensive... I've paid top dollar for pricier foundations and nothing holds a candle to this product. Bury me with this foundation because I can't live (or die) without it!!!!

name: Susie Q
review: i love it before when there were no spf /sun screen added to it. I used it for years. It covered better and last long. Now it is greasy bec of the spf /sunscreen, also it starting to cake to my chin and it gives me a lot of black heads that I have to go to my dermatologist to solve the problem. I'm prone to acne but it was well controlled until I used this new Revlon with sunscreen. We should have a choice of using separate sunscreen, not added to foundation.

name: Amber the make up artist.
review: I use this for my everyday foundation. After a few hours though it makes me itchy. And when first applied it looks very oily and almost rubs off. You have to not do anything until it's completely dry. I used a beauty blender to pay it until it was completely dry. But matched my skin tone perfectly.

name: Jade
review: Seriously love this foundation! I have used it when I have a spray tan in a darker shade, as well as this light color with my fair complexion! It is seriously the best foundation I have ever used and I have tried products that cost $60+

name: Mimi
review: This is my go to drugstore foundation because it's matte, made for oily/combo skin, and is long wearing. Another benefit is that they have a shade that matches my darker skin tone! I love this! What is also awesome is that there is not glitter, shine, or anything that draws attention to it. I also love that they added the pump, makes putting it on a beauty blender or brush easier.

name: AngelMar
review: I always like to have a back up of this foundation. I have combination skin, and It stays on my skin for 12 hours. It gives me medium to full coverage, and it doesn't feel cakey. Great affordable foundation!

name: babydinas
review: I have combination skin I love this it doesn't feel heavy on my skin it stays on for hours and I still feel like I just put it on my skin doesn't feel to dry or to oily I definitely recommend this product

name: Maria
review: My holy grail foundation!!

name: Xtina.x0
review: Great product for the price love this foundation I actually find it to work as well as name brands

name: Angie from Nash
review: Foundation and powder is something I am willing to pay extra for buyback I don't need to with Revlon foundation. This is Thebes best foundation for my super pale skin with pink undertones. I us every Lancôme powder, but the Lancôme liquid foundation is way too heavy for me. This is full coverage but light and breathable. It also has an almost undetectable light and pleasant scent. Love this product, been using for almost 2 years now and get skin compliments all the time (helps I stay out of the sun and drink water too)

name: Tori
review: Omg Love the way it just glides over my pores.

name: Kris
review: My go to drug store foundation!

name: Nicole
review: I have heard so many good things about this foundation that I was so excited to try it.  I got the combination/oily formula and I feel like it goes on patchy and makes my chin look really flaky. Definitely going to return this and try something different.

name: Masta Chate
review: I have used Color Stay for 10 years now and it is very disappointing to see the new formula. The foundation is very runny and thinner now; I suppose Revlon changed the formula to stretch the product out, therefore making it cheaper for Revlon to produce. Myself as well as many others are not happy about this. It was such a great foundation. I compared my old bottle from a few months ago to my new bottle and the ingredients are definitely different. I also went to 3 different stores to test the foundation and it is much runnier now. If the product was getting too expensive to produce, a price raise would have been better than runny and thin foundation. I used to only need 1 pump, but now I need 3. I am disappointed in this change and will not be purchasing this, or any Revlon foundation until the formula is thicker.

name: Shelby
review: This foundation is AMAZING. I usually buy brand name make up, but I read a good review about this foundation while researching the best makeup for combination skin and had to try it. For me, it works better than any other brand I have tried, including Urban Decay, Bare Minerals, IT Cosmetics.. I love all of those brands but this one definitely stands out. I have combination skin, my nose tends to get very oily throughout the day while my cheeks and chin are dry and flaky. This foundation keeps my face matte through 12+ hour, busy shifts without having to blot and the dry areas never flake. I love this foundation and will definitely continue to buy.

name: mikaylanic
review: When I first purchased this product, I was absolutely in love with it. It made my skin look so even and had good coverage. A few days later I went to take off the lid and the pump came out and made my whole room a mess. After a few weeks of using this my skin became very dry and started breaking out. I have relatively sensitive skin but this started to burn when I applied it and caused my face to be extremely dry and flakey. Would not recommend!

name: Jamie C
review: I have owned some high end foundations and always go back to this. My skin can get oily, but I have dry patches within it. So oily nose but peals as well. This foundation works great for me. Sometimes I don't moisturize when in a rush and this still works great. This foundation also evens out my skin tone. I have used this with primer and without. The benefit of primer is it will blend even smoother. I use a big foundation brush (not the flat one) to apply. Works well in humid summers and dry winters in Chicago.

name: kate
review: Love this product and it is great since ulta has a buy one get one half off. I love stocking up on this product. It is amazing

name: drugstorebeautyguru
review: I use this product every day and loved it right away. I have experimented with many different drugstore brands and have never been satisfied with a product to buy it more that once but Revlon ColorStay changed that for me. It's the first foundation I've found that has a shade that truly matches my skin tone and it lasts well throughout my day. So far I've purchased four bottles and I plan on continuing to use this product for a while. Keep in mind though that I do beauty on a budget, I've never spent more than $15 on a single product so none of my experience is in comparison to more upscale brands.

name: Bestie
review: Blends good. I never really use foundation because sometimes it can make me look cakey, but this product still gives a natural look.

name: Ally
review: I've tried everything. Makeup forever HD, Este� Lauder double wear, maybelline fit me, tarte Amazonian clay, too faced born this way, all of the top rated foundations. And none do them come even close to this one. So much cheaper and so much better than high end foundations! I've bought this for 3 years now and I always come back to it after trying other foundations. Gives a flawless finish and lasts all day and night.

name: Mattee
review: I really like this foundation, it feels great on my skin, looks nice and covers well. It's a good price for something that works as well as high end make up. My biggest problem is that I have no idea which shade is mine. In everything else I buy buff because it is a good match but in this brand it is way too pale. I like that it isn't pinky or orange because I have a yellow skin tone but I need to find out which one will be the right shade!

name: Mya
review: This foundation is by far one of the best cheaper foundations I have ever tried out! Definitely will repurchase!

name: NAK
review: I use this product for every day use as well as special occasions.

name: Tccaves
review: Everyday use

name: willa g.
review: This foundation is amazing and is the opposite of cakey. It's pretty reasonable coverage, and i like it because it's not full coverage, but that's my own preference.

name: KF
review: Have used this makeup for years. I often try new foundations, all price points, but always come back to Colorstay.  It is an excellent product, and works just as well, or better, than more expensive foundations.

name: Megan
review: It wasn't too matte or greasy.  Decent coverage as well

name: Grandma Kak
review: Covers well and lasts all day.

name: Julieta
review: I used to use this product a few years ago. Then I tried tarte, urban decay and when I use this again, I was so pleased with the results.  I would keep buying this over and over. And the price is so much better than the other brands.  I'm so happy I returned to use this product.

name: Eliza S.
review: I bought this because I was yet to find something that kept my oily face at bay. This foundation looks great even after 10 hours of wear. WITHOUT HAVING TO BLOT MY FACE!

name: Liz
review: This is my favorite drugstore foundation. I've tried almost every matte drugstore foundation, and I have found that this one works best (for me)! It stays on all day, and it keeps my oil production to a minimum (I use other oil control products as well). For the first time ever, the lightest shade is a bit too light for me, but I intend to buy it again one shade up! This is my holy grail drugstore foundation!

name: Pam
review: Have been using this product for a whike . Love it.

name: Annmarie G.
review: I got this product off of a friend's recommendation and I absolutely love it! It has a nice coverage, I'd say medium and definitely buildable! It's my current foundation and I am very pleased with it! It is not too expensive and has a pretty good variety of shades!

name: whatAcatchMandy
review: This is my all time fav foundation. I have tried lots of high end foundations like tarte, make up forever, and even my favorite brand, too faced. But none of them even come close to this drugstore foundation. It's matte, good coverage, but not heavy. AND IT STAYS PUT ALL DAY. I've swam in it, went to concerts in the dead heat of summer, and it's stays better than any foundation I've ever used. Definitely worth the buy.

name: N/A
review: Great

name: Mel
review: Would like more coverage without having to select a darker color.

name: Mainemom
review: Great coverage for the price

name: 1ponymom
review: I have been looking for a foundation for my oily skin, that would not make me shiner as the day goes on, and I believe I have found just that. I have tried many brands all with the same results super oily skin by mid-morning, and if I get just for oily skin then I look dull then oily and thick. This goes on nicely and doesn't leave me super shiny, just right

name: Ernrs1
review: Love this stuff was on the hunt for a cheap alternative  to my double wear foundation  for work . Last 12 hour  shift only hat to blot once  and did not cause me to breakout. This product is chocolate girl friendly didn't not oxidize  and give me a dark grey undertones . Best alternative  to my double wear foundation  have bad luck with drug store products  colorsfay was recommended  to me by ulta staff and I glad she did will continue  room purchase  this product  for work .

name: Brie
review: This is a great, inexpensive foundation!

name: Lexie
review: I have extremely oily/acne prone skin and have had it for as long as I can remember. I have tried every "matte" foundation, setting spray, and primer. This foundation worked well at first but after about 2 weeks of using it I had to switch. The coverage is great when you first put it on but it creases terribly, and the oils from my skin break it up within an hour of wearing it giving my pores a magnified look and an overall greasy look to my face. Which is ultimately what I am trying to avoid. I had high hopes for this foundation but the only real perk to it is coverage.

name: Hate nicknames
review: Used it in the past tried other products but this is the best. I am a black American but have olive tones not red or yellow and it is hard to find the right color this one works best for me including higher end products.

name: ccspaz
review: I have been using this foundation for 5+ years. I have generally clear skin and this makes it look perfect. It never makes me break out and goes on smooth. I would recommend it to all my friends.

name: Moma1974
review: Coverage not as good as MAC but for the price it's OK.  Would recommend it for emergency situations or as a backup plan.

name: Jessi
review: This use to be my holy grail. I would get complimented multiple times a day about my makeup and when they heard it was an affordable brand they couldn't believe. Then boom are long changed the formula and now my holy grail is a hellish nightmare. I wish they would go back. I miss it.

name: wrenzilla
review:
All day wear!
Great coverage and long lasting.
Stays on even through a workout, doesn't sweat off!

name: Carelyn
review: Love this product, great coverage and goes well with my oily skin

name: ChaydeeLady
review: Bottom line: I love this product. I have oily skin and it seems like I always have to settle when it comes to foundation; I've almost just accepted that I will always have to touch up or dab my face to slick up its oiliness. However, when I used this product, I stayed looking shine free all day. I love that it has medium to buildable coverage without caking up. Because this foundation seems like it dries quickly, I applied this using a damp beauty blender in sections and it worked out great for me. If you're on the fence about buying this product, I would definitely try it out!

name: Sahm93
review: I have usedthis product for years! Love it! My daughters use it as well. Works better than the high end brands.

name: Ana
review: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE BRING BACK THE OLD FORMULA THIS NEW ONE IS TERRIBLE!!!!! Please the old formula was the BEST.

name: Des
review:
After using MAC studio fix for about 9 years, I decided that it was time to look for something else. I have acne prone and oily skin, and studio fix did not help that at all.

After using colorstay for about a week, I can tell you guys that I haven't had any breakouts on my face. This is not something that I was able to say when I was wearing studio fix. It's like I was breaking out every other day. This foundation dries to the skin, and gives you a matte finish. This allows people with oily skin to get more wear out of the foundation. Studio fix did not dry matte, and I had to use lots of powder over it to make it look matte. With colorstay, I only apply powder under my eyes for a brightening effect. I don't have to apply powder to my normally oily t-zone, because this stuff keeps it dry. I am finally able to wear a moisturizer under my make up without worrying that it will make my skin look oily. In fact, I find that when I do add powder all over my face when using this foundation, my face gets very oily within a few hours.

**TIP: Do not wet your sponge when applying this foundation. It will mess up the formula, and cause the foundation to roll up like dry skin on your face. I know that this technique is used to make foundation look natural, but this foundation already looks very natural. Apply it with a dry sponge.

name: Disappointed
review: I used this product as a daytime full coverage for work. I like my foundation to give me nice coverage for work but not look Carey or heavy. This coverage was what I would expect from a tinted moisturizer not a foundation. I am not keeping the product and would not recommend it because the color or coverage, what little it had did not stay on.

name: Amber
review: I love this product. Every other cover up I've tried has paled in comparison

name: Lizzie
review: I used this foundation with the IT brush i bought at the same time. I used the darkest shade they had available and i believe the color was mocha...made me look dusty even though I'm a mocha in the airbrush line.

name: Gracie
review: My favorite YouTuber Evelina Forsell recommended this product and I hate it. I mean it has good coverage and color, but I have never worn such an uncomfortable foundation in my life. As soon as I put it on it felt heavy and drying. My face itched so bad (usually happens when I wear heavy foundation). Maybe this works better for more oily skin than my combo, but I didn't like it.

name: lipstickjunkie94
review:
Before using this foundation, I had been using the Revlon 2-in-1 crème compact and was looking for something a bit lighter in consistency. I had heard that the Revlon Colorstay formula had been revamped and was pretty good compared to the old formula. I gave it a try and wow what a difference! When applied with a damp sponge, it goes on so smoothly and evenly. It blends out like a dream. The cool thing is that it really does have buildable coverage. It starts out a bit light, but you can definitely add more product to places that need it and it won't get too cakey (tbh any foundation will get cakey if you put on enough...). It stays put all day and using a primer and powder helps too. It doesn't get patchy in areas if your face gets oily throughout the day either.

Overall, it's a very nice drugstore foundation and totally worth the price paid for it. If you have oily skin, this might be a good option for you!

name: Jo
review: This foundation lasts all day, I get a little oily by the end of the day and this won't show it. I've tried matte, drug store ones, I've tried high end such as Urban decay and this is a lot better in coverage. They finally got the pump which is easier to apply because it is heavy, so I just use two small pumps. I wasn't looking for full coverage but once you use it, you'll love how your skin looks, and I started using it because I saw a few beauty bloggers raving about it.

name: CyndiT
review: This is the only foundation I have used for 20 years! I love it. It stays on all day long and comes in the right shades for summer to winter wear.  I have tried other long wear foundations but this is the only one that lasts all day and stays looking good.  Also, is fairly water resistant so stays on even in the pool.  I haven't tried all the top end foundations, but I don't need too. This one works the best!

name: Gina
review: Nice smooth feeling after apply.

name: Summermon
review: Meh.   A very standard makeup.   Not great coverage and the natural finish isn't the most flattering on my skin.   Will not reach for this.   Not bad,  but doesn't do anything for me.

name: Maggie888
review: This is the best foundation ever! It's the only one that works well for me! I have used everything & this is the only one that works well for me

name: pj-Harley
review: i LOVE this product for everyday use i have acne scars and this product is great to cover them up.

name: shea
review: I love the way this sits on my skin, it's amazingly buildable coverage. I love the color range, I'm very pale so it's hard to find such a porcelain/white shade for me.

name: Adrienne
review: It goes on smooth and looks great, when you first put it on, but it doesn't last! Within hours after applying, it became blotchy and looked like it was trying to melt off my face, but it also dries your skin. Good if you're oily, but bad for combo skin. Covergirl Outlast is much better.

name: E. King
review: Would buy again

name: Raquel
review: I have horrible acne scars and it covered them up nicely! The only problem was I ended up breaking out more because of this product.

name: Nursegrace
review: I've tryed other foundation, OTC and name brand. This works best for me. No breakouts, breathable make up.

name: Gabi
review: Excellent if you apply with a sponge (beauty blender)

name: Val
review: I have neen using this makeup for years.

name: mary
review: I found this product to be very sticky and hard to blend in.

name: iliana
review: I used to love the old formula ( years ago ) I got this again a few months ago and I hated it! It's extremely dry and it makes my dry spots look horrible, I tried mixing it with a more moisturizing foundation and it didn't work either! I have oily skin and still it looked cakey and just bad.

name: Hayden
review: I used it with a stippling brush. Didn't give enough coverage as I had hoped. Almost like I wasn't wearing makeup.

name: Lid
review: This is one of my all time favorite products. The coverage is great, the finish is great and it lasts till you're ready to take it off.

name: Jim the runner
review: Needs a second layer for full coverage

name: Johnnie P
review: Use it everyday

name: Katie
review: I love this foundation. I have insanely oily skin and I've tried tons of foundation, high and low end and this is one of the best. It's a pretty matte finish, and although my skin is oily I prefer more of a natural look, but I know a ton of people will appreciate that it's matte so I can't complain. Great coverage as well :)

name: Kate the Student
review: My skin is oily and I sweat constantly, so this item is perfect for helping me keep that looking under control during the day. Since it goes on so evenly, though, it does require some light contouring to make sure your face doesn't look like a mask.

name: barden
review: Used a sponge to apply. Makeup lasted all day!!

name: Monica Lacey
review: My t-zone is fairly oily, with my cheeks being super dry and flaky. This is the only foundation I've come across so far that is able to make my entire face look a little healthier.

name: ManiPedi
review: Usually buy Lancome and read great things about this foundation. I'm a true neutral light-medium. Had to exchange color once and might have to again. Tester would help but I'll stick with finding correct one. Foundation feels wonderful and layering coverage is easy and natural-looking

name: rachhxxo
review: I have combo skin and get oily in my T-zone. I've been contemplating on buying this foundation because I heard it was the dupe for the Est�e Lauder double wear in which I picked up a sample of and LOVED(stayed on through humidity and a whole night out and still looked amazing). I figured I'd just try this out and if worst came to worse I would just go and buy Est�e Lauder's... but turns out I didn't even have to !! this foundation is most definitely a dupe and wears flawlessly ! stays matte in my T-zone and doesn't dry out or flake my drier spots. application is just jaw dropping I highly recommend trying this out, especially for the price comparison to a high end foundation!

name: none
review: I think this product lives up to it's description. I may be reacting to switching brands. withholding judgement for a while.

name: Lisa
review: Nothing negative

name: Madeline
review: No matter what I always go back to this foundation and it is way better than a lot of high end foundations! When I first applied it I was amazed! It goes on so smoothly and makes your skin look airbrushed. One of my favorite parts about this foundation is that IT DOES NOT CLING TO DRY PATCHES! It goes over them flawlessly and it was such an awesome moment because I have dry patches around my nose and cheeks a lot. I have combination skin so I get a bit oily , but I live in the blazing hot and humid Florida so my skin gets more oily than it should. I first wore this on Halloween, the best test because you're out all night and it's hot! This. Foundation. Did. Not. Move. After hours and hours it still looked just as flawless as it did when I first applied it. That's saying a lot! It makes me look like at doll and covers everything. Absolutely Medium to full coverage. I highly recommend this to anyone. Please just get it , you won't regret it.

name: JB
review:
After trying all of the foundations beauty gurus have raved about.. I will be returning to this foundation. I have combination/oily skin but there are times where my t-zone or my chin get incredibly oily out of no where and no foundation seems to hold it in except for this one. I was using a Mary Kay foundation, then Clinique, and then I saw I still had some of this left over and the day I wore it again I came home and my entire face still felt completely matte. I didn't have to use a blotting paper two hours into my shift or even do touch ups. I still wanted to give another foundation a try but I will be returning it as well and buying a new bottle of ColorStay.

If you have oily skin definitely give this a try.

name: Kassidy Mckinney
review: This is a dupe for MAC's foundation and it really is that good.

name: CMang
review: This goes on beautifully at first but after about 2 hours my skin looks so greasy and the product starts breaking down. It also looks like the foundation just sits on top of my skin and never "meshes" with it. I would recommend the loreal pro matte instead

name: Monica219
review: I use this product every day, blend with beauty blender.

name: adriana
review: This is one of my favorite drugstore foundations. It has pretty good coverage and its about 12-15 bucks I believe.

name: doxielady
review: I live in Florida and have oil/ combination skin, but I get super oily on my nose and forehead in the summer. This foundation beat the heat! I've gone for walks in the middle of a hot Florida day wearing this foundation, it did not budge. I smeared sun block over this foundation, it did not budge. I've used the Maybelline Fit Me foundation for a while and always hated how it settled into fine lines, so I watched closely for that with this Revlon foundations. It did not settle into my fine lines. I was amazed! It looks and feels natural. I just love it, so happy I tried it.

name: Erika
review: I use this every day for years. It's the best foundation. I'm olive skin tone and use color #300. I have oily combination skin. I'm a nurse and the color last all day

name: Gabby
review: Great foundation

name: Kaitlin
review: I used to buy the expensive foundations, however, this one works the best.

name: Skarleth B
review: I've been the brand buyer and the budget buyer over the course of my makeup experience,  and I must say,  this is one of my favorite!  I used to wear Chanel,  YSL,  Dior and Laura Mercier foundations,  and I feel like,  this Revlon compares at a 90% for like an eighth of the price of high brand.  This foundation is so light,  with great coverage.  I'm constantly getting complimented on my skin appearance and flawlessness of my foundation.  I don't usually review items,  but this is a must.  Revlon is my favorite foundation/conceler/powder brand.  Great selection for all skin types.

name: Alyssa5215
review: This actually lasts like it says! I love it so much! It doesn't break me out and keeps my  slight oily patches at bay. I have been looking for a foundation that lasts through the heat, keeps my oil spots at bay and doesn't break me out. Finally!!!!!!!

name: Lily R
review: This foundation really stays matte as long as you set it with powder! I wear it for big events when I want my face to be 100% flawless. Because it is full coverage it can feel a little heavy, but I apply with a sponge to make it feel more comfortable.  I haven't had breakouts from it (my skin is pretty normal, more oily than dry) but I always 100% remove it and wash my face before I go to bed.

name: Ash
review: I couldn't be more upset about this product. First off, I've been using this since I was in high school. Ever since they switched to the pump version of the foundation... They also changed the formula. Now I don't know what the heck to use as a foundation....it doesn't even stay matte. I use smash box photo primer, and even then my foundation starts to melt off my face and I get oily. For people who are interested... Don't waste your time if you have an oily face. The old version without the pump and formula was amzing. Now I have to invest in a new foundation and waste money trying to find a new one that has a matte finish. I couldn't be more disappointed and upset with Revlon. Hope you guys look up reviews before purchancing.. Try and your own risk.

name: Jewels
review: I love this product, been using it for years.  I feel though,  after a couple hours of wear,  the lines around the eyes look deeper.  Also  glad it has a uv protection.

name: Yaya
review: Matte finish stays on for 12 hours

name: Jessica
review: I was trying a new makeup.  I like the coverage and that it is not greasy.  I wish it went on a little heavier, but that could be me.

name: Aimee Gee
review: I have red blotchy skin and this gives me full coverage and an even tone

name: Deb
review: Everyday, stays on even in hot weather

name: Yung_D
review: Love it

name: Karol
review: Love it!!

name: MeiC
review: Felt a little heavy and was wrong shade, but I'm sure it would have been fine otherwise

name: bgas
review: Great budget product. I used to not care about price, but recently lost my job and needless to say, it was time to purchase some more foundation, thought I would try it and I love it and the price too!!  MUST have for my makeup collection, which is HUGE!!

name: Kaela
review: I normally wear Bobbi Brown but was tired of wasting make up for days like work days so I started seeking out a cheaper alternative! This product could be compared to MAC studio fix the way it goes on, the coverage is pretty good especially if you like light to medium coverage! I just wish it had testers because I had to buy the wrong shade before finally finding and settling on a better shade which I actually enjoy about name brand make up, the fact that I can test it..

name: Mariatere
review: Awesome product, better than many expensive foundations.

name: Kim
review: Would recommend this product.

name: tcw
review: lasts long and goes on smooth

name: Nesa
review: This is my fav drugstore foundation. I use Lancôme as my high end. But with the revlon color stay I don't need to blot or touch up with powder for hours it's not a flat matte, not drying but gives me great coverage without feeling heavy.. I'm combination oily skin and this product controls my oils well without overdrying whatsoever! And everytime I try to find a new drug store foundation I become disappointed after a couple of hours of wear.. I end up coming back to this everytime.. Only con for me is when I get darker in the summer it's kinda hard to find my new color in the oily combination collection they offer.

name: Mic
review: Your deep really is deep we need more dark color for women of color that has deeper dark skin tone then your deep color

name: Tara
review: Easy to apply with the pump and it makes product last longer for me! I have trusted in ColorStay for years!

name: Zara
review: I use this product everyday and it has amazing coverage! I apply it with a damp beauty blender and it glides on so well and leaves me with a perfect matte finish!

name: Kel
review: I love this foundation. It has great coverage. A little goes a long way!!

name: Jessica
review: I have been using this foundation for several years now. I have tried other ones but always come back to thisone. I have very oily, but sensitive skin. This doesn't irritate my skin or cause break outs.

name: pj-Harley
review: I love this product because i have very oily skin and this helps control the oil.  The bottle i purchased was one without the pump and I see they've added a pump to the new bottles which is great because the product is thick and difficult to get out of the bottle, the pump will help.

name: Dancer145
review: Very nice coverage. I don't even need to put concealer on my general problem areas most of the time. Lightweight feel, cannot feel it in your skin. Very easy to work with, great for beginners. Really a great product for anyone with normal to oily skin. I am very oily in spots and normal to dry in others. Even on my dry patches, this product is great.

name: coppertop
review: Color was perfect for my pale skin and I was really hoping for a lasting matte finish. I applied primer before and it still started to slide and look very shiny by the end of the day. If you don't have oily skin, this product will probably work really well for you!

name: Aryn
review: I have had a lot of trouble with oily skin and eczema. I've tried using brands such as Estée Lauder's Pefectionist, and to be honest with you, that didn't work for me! I read a lot of reviews about this foundation so I decided to give it a try. Let me tell you, this has been great for me! I love this liquid foundation, and I recommend it to anyone with sensitive and/or oily skin.

name: Amlebra
review: This is my holy grail! I have searched high and low for an affordable foundation that doesn't make me look like I stuck my face in grease at the end of the day. It's light as a feather, insanely soft and makes my skin look incredible. I am awestruck! My bronzer and mascara break down before this does even in 100% humidity and heat! I live in South a Florida. It melts right into my skin and looks like I have a perfecting filter on all day and it's got SPF in it but doesn't ghost me out when I take pics! My only tip is scrub well bevagse I had a few pimples after a few wears.

name: Anon
review: This is a pretty good product. I switched over to this after using Revlon's foundation for oily skin, I hadn't been a fan of the formula, it was really thin but heavy and you'd has to layer it on to get a fair amount of coverage. With the Combo-Oily I get the amount of coverage I need(I'd say medium in 2 layers) without the heavy feeling. I like that it comes with a pump, although two or three times it has gotten stuck and so the foundation would spurt out suddenly. I have fairly oily combination skin, and normally this foundation will last several hours with a powder and a little blotting, but I also don't have a primer. However, starting in the summer I started using Neutrogena's Ultra Sheer Dry Touch Sunscreen(???) and it has kept me pretty matte and oil-free and my makeup lasts almost all day now. Please note that I use this foundation usually just on my t-zone and as a spot-concealer. So it's a pretty good foundation and I will buy it again, but make sure you have a primer, mattifying sunscreen, or powder to wear with it. If you have less oily skin than me it may last longer

name: Jess
review: Bought this foundation because there were more good reviews than bad. However, after using this product, I agree with the bad reviews. It is very hard to blend this product in. I have tried a blending sponge, my fingers, and a foundation brush. It also is very cakey once it is applied and and makes my skin look gross. It keeps flaking around my nose and on my forehead. I also noticed it has a very strong smell and it drives me nuts to go all day being able to smell my own foundation on my face.

name: Divya
review: I have redish face and big pores. This covers my redness very well and last long time even though its over 90 degree hot here.

name: ladi
review:
I blend with another Revlon one in similar shade
To look natural

name: Vester
review: Love the coverage

name: Lisa
review: The new pump is unnecessary

name: qt
review: It stays on oily skin pretty well. I accidentally fell asleep in this and when I woke up it was still on and still looked good. The coverage is decent. I have a lot of redness and for the most part this does the job. It does take several coats sometimes but it doesn't look cakey. My only complaint is that it looks a little orange after it sits for a while. But in bright indoor lighting it matches my skin well.

name: ceebiz1990
review: Fantastic foundation, on par with many high end, long-wearing, full coverage foundations. I used it exclusively for years and recently rediscovered it. After using it once, I'm wondering why I tried anything else. The new formula is quite a bit thinner, but I haven't had any problems with it. It's still the same amazing product. It looks like skin, the finish is semi-matte and natural, and it doesn't budge through eight hours of hard work and even some sweat. I barely have to touch up all day and unlike with literally every other foundation, I'm not a greasy mess by the end of my shift. Doesn't oxidize on you. Only possible caveat: It dries fast, so work quickly while applying. Blend, blend, blend. I'm fair to light skinned, and "buff" is my perfect shade. It looks really light and even a little grey in the bottle, but magically becomes perfect on the skin. Neutral undertone. One of only a few truly incredible foundations at the drug store.

name: Ryan
review: I recently bought this foundation, and loved it! I have acne prone oily/combination skin, and it goes on like a dream. It stays all day and looks great. I would DEFINITELY recommend this!

name: DevJ
review: I was searching for that magical product that will actually stay on my oily, hormonal acne-prone skin without melting off by mid-afternoon. I didn't think it existed, but then I found this little gem. It blends perfectly with my skin tone, covers the redness of my acne well (with little bit of concealer underneath on the really bad zits), and works perfectly with a beauty blender. My skin does get a tiny bit oily by the end of the day, but the foundation stays on regardless, and it's nothing a blotting paper can't take care of. It has a pleasant smell, and I love the pump-style bottle. The only tiny con is that it takes a while to set, about 10 minutes. (I'm always rushing in the morning, so it's a little inconvenient). But overall the coverage is worth it!

name: Vanessa
review: I use it with my hands, best coverage covers redness and acne also scares.

name: Tmichelle
review: I love the pump bottle which makes it easier to apply without the mess but the color of the bottle is not true to the color of the product once applied to your skin.

name: ambee
review:
so I used Kat Von D foundation for years (it was a love and hate relationship). so I decided to switch to this foundation because of the price and reviews. this foundation is wonderful. it is medium to full and it is build able. it feels thin. it's not cakey, thick, or dewy. i would say 1 pump is good for medium and 2 pumps is for full. it blends well with my sponge. I use the NYC translucent finishing powder to set the foundation and it lasts a good while. I have a very oily nose so after about 8 hours it gets oily, but the foundation really hold up well for most of the time.

worth the buy.

name: KLo
review: Daily use, all day coverage!

name: Bella
review:
I used to love this foundation... I'm a makeup artist and I had this in my kit because it was very comparable to MAC and for a third of the price I could afford to have all the shades without breaking the bank... When I saw revlon came out with the new bottle I was so happy, but everything went bad after that.
They changed the formula plus added SPF which now leaves a whitecast, so not good for photography.
This breaks my heart I don't know why companies do this, everyone love this foundation because of it's coverage so there was no point on the new changes I believe this was a total failed.

name: Dejaaaa
review: Pretty cool. Goes on easily. Transitioned from Benefit b/c if breaks outs & I don't have the same problem.

name: K
review: It's a decent price & does the job

name: Mynickname
review:
After reading reviews, i decided to give this a try. I expected a lot out of this foundation, and it fell short of all my expectations.
Pros: stays matte all day
Lots of shades
Has a pump
Cons: Looks patchy after a few hours
Creases around nose, eyes, forehead
Not even medium coverage, like it claims
Oxidizes
Does not cover blemishes or scars
Transfers easily, even when set with powder
Looks cakey, even with just 1 layer (i tried every way to apply it, fingers, Dry sponge, damp sponge, kabuki brush, flat brush.)
MOST importantly, causes breakouts!

name: kbrn
review: I always want to try other foundations but keep coming back to this one. It's got a great finish and doesn't break me out. Use with a beauty blender for best results.

name: Jen
review: This stuff is amazing. You can go light or heavy and lasts all day, even thru my workout!

name: Vampire Princess
